game.name: LOST PLANET® 3 - Survival Pack
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 캡션 이용 가능, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Download the Survival Pack for the ultimate collection of multiplayer characters and close- and long-range weapons, and awesome single player upgrades for your rig!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Download the Survival Pack for the ultimate collection of multiplayer characters and close- and long-range weapons, and awesome single player upgrades for your rig!
